title: 86/563/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 November 1986 amending Decision 81/675/EEC establishing that particular sealing systems are 'non-reusable systems' within the meaning of, inter-alia, Council Directives 66/401/EEC and 69/208/EEC
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 November 1986
amending Decision 81/675/EEC establishing that particular sealing systems are 'non-reusable systems' within the meaning of, inter-alia, Council Directives 66/401/EEC and 69/208/EEC
(86/563/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 1 (2) of Decision 81/675/EEC the words 'within the meaning of Article 9 (1) of Directive 66/402/EEC:' are hereby replaced by the following words:
'within the meaning of:
- Directive 66/401/EEC in so far as the following species are concerned:
Lupinus albus,
Lupinus angustifolius,
Lupinus luteus,
Pisum sativum,
Vicia faba,
Vicia pannonica,
Vicia sativa,
Vicia villosa;
- Directive 66/402/EEC;
- Directive 69/208/EEC in so far as the following species are concerned:
Arachis hypogaea,
Glycine max.,
Gossypium spp.,
Helianthus annuus:'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 November 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
